gaia::ui::FilterQueryProvider Class Reference

This class can be used by external clients of CursorListItemProvider to define how the content of the adapter should be filtered. More...

#include <FilterQueryProvider.h>

virtual gaia::storage::Cursor * runQueryN (const gaia::base::String &constraint)=0
 Runs a query with the specified constraint.

Detailed Description

This class can be used by external clients of CursorListItemProvider to define how the content of the adapter should be filtered.

See also:
